snippet: Cuba’s most high-profile opposition group, the Ladies in White, voted Wednesday to keep their leader, Berta Soler, in a referendum prompted by complaints that she was autocratic and should resign.
lead_paragraph: Cuba’s most high-profile opposition group, the Ladies in White, voted Wednesday to keep their leader, Berta Soler, in a referendum prompted by complaints that she was autocratic and should resign.

headline.main: Cuba: Leader of Dissident Group Retains Her Post After Challenge
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Leader of Dissident Group Retains Her Post After Challenge

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
